input.sentences: there was a charity event and they had animals .
after viewing the animals they played a balloon game .
after that they had fun with bubbles .
after that the man sing for them and all the kids started to dance .
after that the panda man showed up and gave all the kids a hug .
output.sentences: Today we went to the Easter charity event to benefit endangered animals.
All the families enjoyed viewing the exhibits and playing Easter games.
There were even these fun interactive stations, including this bubble blowing area.
One of the event coordinators started singing with the kids.
And at the end the Easter panda gave all the kids hugs before they left.
